LanguageData.FT_MoodOffsetGunNut.stages.0.label: gun nut has ranged weapon
LanguageData.FT_MoodOffsetGunNut.stages.0.description: I love guns! Where's something I can shoot at?
LanguageData.FT_MoodOffsetIronFist.stages.0.label: iron fist has ranged weapon
LanguageData.FT_MoodOffsetIronFist.stages.0.descripti: I don't want to shoot from a distance, I want to fight using my hands!
